createIdentity(address).details: Create a new Identity clone for a user

params.owner: The owner of the new Identity contract

returns.identity: The address of the newly created Identity clone

createIdentityWithClaim(address,uint256,.details: Create a new Identity clone and add a claim in one transaction

params.owner: The owner of the new Identity contract

returns.identity: The address of the newly created Identity clone

getGasSavingsInfo().details: Calculate the gas cost savings of using clones

returns._0: Approximate gas saved per clone vs full deployment

getIdentitiesByOwner(address).details: Get all identities created for a specific user

getTotalIdentities().details: Get total number of identities created

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
